name: AWS Benchmark - Underutilized VPC Interface Endpoints

template.displayName: AWS Benchmark - Underutilized VPC Interface Endpoints

input.defaultValue: AWS Benchmark - Underutilized VPC Interface Endpoints

nextAction.name: step_28

input.commandToRun:
aws cloudwatch get-metric-statistics \
  --namespace "AWS/PrivateLinkEndpoints" \
  --metric-name "NewConnections" \
  --dimensions \
     Name="VPC Id",Value="{{step_d['item']['VPC']}}" \
     Name="VPC Endpoint Id",Value="{{step_d['item']['ID']}}" \
     Name="Endpoint Type",Value="Interface" \
     Name="Service Name",Value="{{step_d['item']['Service']}}" \
  --period 1209600 --statistics Average Maximum Sum \
  --start-time "{{step_k}}" \
  --end-time "{{step_j}}" \
  --region {{step_32['item']}}

aws cloudwatch get-metric-statistics \
  --namespace "AWS/PrivateLinkEndpoints" \
  --metric-name "BytesProcessed" \
  --dimensions \
     Name="VPC Id",Value="{{step_d['item']['VPC']}}" \
     Name="VPC Endpoint Id",Value="{{step_d['item']['ID']}}" \
     Name="Endpoint Type",Value="Interface" \
     Name="Service Name",Value="{{step_d['item']['Service']}}" \
  --period 1209600 --statistics Sum \
  --start-time "{{step_k}}" \
  --end-time "{{step_j}}" \
  --region {{step_32['item']}}

newFieldValue.newFieldValue: VPC Endpoint is underutilized. it's total transfer over last 14 days was: {{step_m}}.

nextAction.displayName: Opportunity doesn't exist or snooze expired
